content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.

content: Hello, Mister Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for the rental?

content: Mister Schmidt, your apartment seems to be in a great location with all the necessary facilities nearby. I'm looking for a place that is not only comfortable but also offers good value for money. What is the lowest price you would consider for this apartment?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mister Wang, I understand your desire for a good deal. However, as a landlord, I need to ensure that I receive a fair price for my property. name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your perspective as a landlord. My budget for this apartment is around 600 Euro per month, inclusive of all utilities. I believe this would be a reasonable amount considering the size and location of the apartment. Would you be willing to accept this offer?

content: Mister Wang, your offer of 600 Euro per month, inclusive of all utilities, is quite generous. However, I must be honest with you. Due to the high demand for apartments in the city center, I was hoping for a slightly higher rent. Would you be willing to negotiate a bit further?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm open to negotiating. Could you please tell me what your preferred rental price would be?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mister Wang, I would ideally like to rent out my apartment for 750 Euro per month, inclusive of all utilities. This price reflects the quality and location of the apartment. Would you be willing to consider this amount?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your proposed price of 750 Euro per month is significantly higher than my initial offer. While I understand the desirability of the location and the amenities, I must remain within my budget. name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Mister Wang, your counter-offer of 650 Euro per month is more in line with what I had in mind. I believe this would be a fair deal for both parties. Would you agree to a rental price of 650 Euro per month, inclusive of all utilities?
